title: Second Impressions
description:
Jamie Brickhouse, Gianmarco Soresi, and Tija Mittal share stories about puppy love, battling step-dads and a bloody accident next door.

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Das Ding, Tija Mittal, The Bar-Kays, Nightmares on Wax, Jeff Barr, Gianmarco Soresi, Gizmo Varillas, Kevin Allison, Jamie Brickhouse)
